Package org.robolectric.shadows.support.v4

Shadows for the Android Support Library.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ShadowAsyncTaskLoader<D>
    Shadow for AsyncTaskLoader.
    ShadowCursorLoader
    Shadow for CursorLoader.
    ShadowDrawerLayout
    Shadow for DrawerLayout.
    ShadowLocalBroadcastManager
    Shadow for LocalBroadcastManager.
    ShadowLocalBroadcastManager.Wrapper  
    ShadowSwipeRefreshLayout
    Shadow for SwipeRefreshLayout
    SupportFragmentController<F extends android.support.v4.app.Fragment>
    Version of FragmentController that can be used for android.support.v4.Fragment.
    SupportFragmentTestUtil
    Utilities for creating Fragments for testing.

Package org.robolectric.shadows.support.v4 Description

Shadows for the Android Support Library.

To use this in your project, add the artifact org.robolectric:shadows-support-v4 to your project.
